member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.Transform2DEffect

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D 2D Affine transform effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.Transform2DEffect.Source

member.remarks: This property is initialized to null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.Transform2DEffect.Sharpness
member.summary: When using high quality cubic interpolation mode, specifies the sharpness level of the scaling filter as a float between 0 and 1.
member.remarks: You can use sharpness to adjust the quality of image scaling. The sharpness factor affects the shape of the filter kernel. The higher the sharpness factor, the smaller the kernel.
